item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. China tells its AI leaders to avoid U.S. travel over security concerns (162 points | 87 comments)
2. The most unhinged video wall, made out of Chromebooks (302 points | 32 comments)
3. Show HN: Berlin Swapfest – Electronics flea market (103 points | 16 comments)
4. Nuclear Reactor Lasers: From Fission to Photon (19 points | 2 comments)
5. Efabless – Shutdown Notice (71 points | 31 comments)
6. Show HN: I made a website where you can create your own "Life in Weeks" timeline (82 points | 22 comments)
7. Python as a second language empathy (2018) (27 points | 8 comments)
8. How Flash Games Shaped the Video Game Industry (11 points | 2 comments)
9. How to gain code execution on hundreds of millions of people and popular apps (1059 points | 267 comments)
10. Abusing C to implement JSON parsing with struct methods (40 points | 5 comments)
11. Making o1, o3, and Sonnet 3.7 hallucinate for everyone (169 points | 141 comments)
12. Video encoding requires using your eyes (55 points | 28 comments)
13. GLP-1 drugs: An economic disruptor? (2024) (282 points | 351 comments)
14. Drone captures narwhals using their tusks to explore, forage and play (44 points | 7 comments)
15. Maestro – Next generation mobile UI automation (119 points | 49 comments)
16. Show HN: I took over Painteresque, a 14 year old Objective-C app and rebuilt it (25 points | 7 comments)
17. Measles: The race to understand 'immune amnesia' (20 points | 2 comments)
18. What do people see when they're tripping? Analyzing Erowid's trip reports (129 points | 174 comments)
19. OpenGL to WASM, learning from my mistakes (70 points | 18 comments)
20. GSA Eliminates 18F (357 points | 280 comments)
21. Certificate Transparency in Firefox (156 points | 94 comments)
22. Xcode constantly phones home (119 points | 39 comments)
23. Why it's so hard to build a jet engine (340 points | 158 comments)
24. 3,200% CPU Utilization (455 points | 205 comments)
25. Emacs Tree-sitter custom highlighting (56 points | 3 comments)
26. Depending in Common Lisp – Using the CLOS dependent maintenance protocol (2022) (85 points | 22 comments)
27. The housing theory of everything (2021) (262 points | 280 comments)
28. Zen 5's AVX-512 Frequency Behavior (186 points | 57 comments)
29. Euclid finds complete Einstein Ring in NGC galaxy (5 points | discuss)
30. Copilot for Everything: Training your AI replacement one keystroke at a time (124 points | 73 comments)
